title: IE 3rd Annual Thank A Sheros Event
desc: This event is in honor of Women's Military History Week to?promote positive images provide resources and public awareness of women?s contributions from all branches and eras of service, recognizing the tremendous contributions made by all military women to this  N ation ,  the  S tate ,  and Communities The Women Veterans Unity Group  in partnership with the Inland Empire Women Veterans Collaborative  will have the honor to host the  Inland Empire?3rd  Annual  Thank A S heros  Event during Women?s Military History Week  the third week in March .  The Event Theme is ?Addressing Women Gender-Specific Resources?.  Our purpose is to serve and empower the Women Veteran Communities and perform outreach to improve women veterans awareness of eligibility for communities,  education,  county, state ,  veteran services and benefits. This event will allow the women veteran,  other service providers, and communities to participate in a series of events during the 3 rd  week in March to show our appreciation for women military service to our country. We will include informative and  inspirational women speakers
